meanings.definition: A class of chemical compounds containing two nitro groups attached to a benzene ring.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study dinitrobenzenes to understand their properties better.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use dinitrobenzenes in various experiments due to their unique structure.
meanings.sent3: The dinitrobenzenes in the lab decided to throw a party to bond over their shared characteristics.
meanings.sent4: The dinitrobenzenes in the mixture exploded with vibrant energy, creating a colorful display.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of dinitrobenzenes lingered in the air, leaving a lasting impression.
